website_summaries.verdict: A good set of neoprene dumbbells that aren't super expensive.
pros: This set includes 3-pound, 5-pound, and 8-pound weights and a stand
Hexagonal shape allows them to sit securely on the floor when placed
cons: The stand is not very stable and the weights have a strong chemical smell at first

website_summaries.verdict: A small neoprene weight set with a decent stand.
pros: Unlike other small weight sets, the included plastic rack is actually practical and holds up well, even when weights are dropped into it
The neoprene is soft and comfortable
cons: The stand is difficult to assemble
Neoprene may smell for a short period

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS TOXIC off-gassing from these weights
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst chemical off-gas experience we've ever had buying any type of consumer product. Just opening the box and taking the plastic off of one weight gave the several of us in the room stinging eyes, immediate headaches and in one chase stinging lungs. Is this seriously a product designed to improve our health?? really not well thought out. If you want weights, would urge you to try a different brand. We have another neoprene weight pair and they have always been odorless.
customer_reviews.author: RandomGleamings

customer_reviews.title: Neoprene Dumbbell Set
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find many choices with 3/5/8lb weights, and chose this due to the positive reviews and the price. Neoprene coating gives it a good grip. It's a good start for anyone who wants to develop their forearms, and biceps. The weight rack is plastic and rickety. This is probably the only downside. Overall, this was a good buy. If you are gifting this, just remember you are buying weights. 32lbs of weights and maybe another pound for packaging and the unassembled rack.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad dumb bells
customer_reviews.text: The color of dumb bells leaks out after using it when your hands are wet. The rack is hard to put together because the holes are not pre-screw so I have to drill it and screw them one by one. The weights are not accurate. One is lighter than others. And one is heavier than others. Unbalanced.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Dumbells are great, stand not so much
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I love the dumbells! They are very easy to hold and workout with. They have a great grip that doesn't hurt your hands. There is two things I don't like with this set and they both are about the stand. First, the stand is a bluish purple color, not gray as in the photo. Also it is made of plastic that feels very cheap. Other than that I love my dumbells!
customer_reviews.author: Angelika2014

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment for home workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I love these weights! Some other reviews said they arrived with tears or flaws, but they were in zip-tie secured packaging and arrived in perfect condition. The stand is sturdy enough to withhold having the weights dropped onto it rather carelessly (post-workout apathy, am I right?) and was a breeze to assemble. The neoprene makes the weights easy to grip, and the hexagon shape provides stability for moves such as plank rows. The diameter of the grip does get bigger with increasing weight, but I'm a tiny girl with tiny hands and it doesn't pose a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Weights great; rack not so much
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weights with the neoprene covering. My previous set did not have any covering so they slip out of my hands. Don't have the problem with these! I would've given this item a higher rating but the rack is a flimsy, plastic piece of you-know-what that falls apart anytime you try to place or remove one of the weights. If you're only buying this particular item because it includes the rack (as I did), don't bother; just buy the weight set.
customer_reviews.author: ATLshopDIVA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These came exactly as I was expecting. I'm giving it five stars because they were exactly what I was looking for and had the softer grip I like rather than the metal. Before ordering these, I was aware the stand would be plastic. I know this docked some stars for other reviewers, however, I knew this before purchasing so I wasn't disappointed. The plastic stand holds just fine! Overall, worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product a better rating. The stand is cheap plastic, and not all of the holes for the screws were drilled through so it could not be assembled. I also did not like the feel of the neoprene weights.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Weights are Great, Rack is Crap
customer_reviews.text: Love the weights but do not bother with the cheap, plastic rack. It is UTTER RUBBISH! I have bread bags that are sturdier. The peg holes (for the screws) are too small so it is quite a little workout just trying to get the screws in without stripping them. I am purchasing a separate metal rack, and I encourage you to do the same. I demolished this one with the 8lb weight, and I have to say, that 8 pound weight works great!! Talk about relieving stress!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact with a sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: This little set rocks. I use it every day. I keep it in a little basket in my living room doorway covered with a lightweight throw. No one knows there is a set of weights there. Nice and compact with a sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.author: East Coast Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: I'd but them again!
customer_reviews.text: I have grip issues and usually have trouble keeping a hold on dumbbells. The coating on these is great. I haven't dropped them at all. The stand is convenient and keeps my family from tripping on them. The colors are bright and the numbers on the ends are reflective too so at night they're still visible. We keep a dim night light in the room and even the minimal light from it is enough for the weights to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Haylie

customer_reviews.title: They're very affordable and Great! I will totally buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest I've found. They're very affordable and Great! I will totally buy again! I wish they had the next size up (32lbs+) so I can buy another set. Most people complained about the stand and to be honest the stand worked perfectly fine for me. It didn't come with screws but I used some of my smallest one and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bright, colorful weights for my 15yo daughter. Received black. Weights seem fine, and feel nice in the hand... just disappointed that they are not what I ordered. (And too close to Christmas to try to replace them)
customer_reviews.author: caryatid

customer_reviews.title: Weights are fine, the stand is not.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are as described, which is nice. Unfortunately the stand that it comes with is incredibly flimsy. Unless I got a defective one, it doesn't fit together, and if you try to put the weights on it, it just falls over. I'm a little disappointed in that, as I got this set above others because I wanted to have a stand to come along with the weights. I know this is relatively minor, but I'm still a little bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love my weight set just wish I can find another set with 10lb weights and up For a beginner lifting weights this is perfect and ideal and takes up very little space
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Love Different Weight Options & Colors
customer_reviews.text: These have been easy to use during my daily 30 minute workouts. Pleased with colors and holder as they are stored in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these right at the beginning of the shelter in place orders of 2020 when the gyms all closed. These came exactly as described in the coating provides a soft cushion to keep the weights from clanging on the floor. Love the bright citrus colors too. The rack works, it’s a bit flimsy but I would have purchased them without it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Eninsche

customer_reviews.title: (it looks easy and should be
customer_reviews.text: The holder was a bit hard to put together, (it looks easy and should be, but the holes where the screws go are either too small or not there, so getting them in straight and properly placed was a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Brooks

customer_reviews.title: ... stand and my husband said it was kind of annoying to put together
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviewers complained about the stand and my husband said it was kind of annoying to put together, but not too bad, and the stand has held up well for several months now. Weights are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great weights
customer_reviews.text: Weights r great. Holder is cheap and probably won't last long. My husband drilled holes and put screws in the holder to make it sturdier but still probably won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of dumbbell weights, but were smelly at first
customer_reviews.text: Weights are nice, but they emitted a terribly offensive chemical smell upon the unboxing. I had to leave them out in the open air for a few days and wash them down with water to lessen the odor. Also, the rack was kind of difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Good set of weights
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these while he watches tv in the bedroom. They are well made and store easily on his tv cart. No odd turpentine-like smell like a set I bought from a big box store locally. Nice grip. Good selection of weights -- not too light, not too heavy, just right for seniors.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: great for home workouts!
customer_reviews.text: these are great, i really love being able to some weight training at home with youtube workouts! as other reviewers noted, the dumbbells smell a little weird at first but that goes away once you air them out. a good investment for your home fitness area!
customer_reviews.author: megatron

customer_reviews.title: Great set for light weight work outs and toning
customer_reviews.text: Great set for light weight work outs and toning. The "stand" is basically a joke - not very sturdy at all, so I just tossed it out. If that's the main reason you plan to buy this set, it's probably better to go for another option
customer_reviews.author: Ashleen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for? I stripped all the screws trying to build the weight stand because the pegs aren't predrilled and they're plastic. So couldn't tighten and now it's wobbly. Need the stand because the dye is coming off all the weights so I don't want the dye on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Micker

customer_reviews.title: Great weights!
customer_reviews.text: These definitely have a smell out of the box but if you air them out they're fine. Great weights, super cute colors. The stand is a light purple rather than grey. Comfortable to hold and well balanced. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie A McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weights for light at-home exercise routines
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weights for light at-home exercise routines! The weights kind of give off a neoprene smell that eventually goes away. Love that this came with a rack - but it's made of plastic and seems very fragile (hasn't broken yet).
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: but they are great. Feel very well made and the grippy surface ...
customer_reviews.text: I never use these, but they are great. Feel very well made and the grippy surface makes them easy to hold (better than metal weights). The holder itself seems flimsy at first, but it's actually pretty sturdy. I would not recommend trying to move all the weights and the holder at once.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy get a different stand
customer_reviews.text: Ei oqned this for 9months wanted to be surd before i wrote my review. Excluding the dumbbell stand, dumbells are great. I do not regret the purchase. The dumbell stand/rack is downright Terrible!!!! All plastic screws hard to fix in. Would otherwise be 5
customer_reviews.author: Twinz_J.

customer_reviews.title: The barbells are good but the stand is pure garbage
customer_reviews.text: The barbells are good but the stand is pure garbage! I bought this for the stand and it is not secure. You are better off buying barbells without this unreliable stand! The rack is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good weights. Bad stand
customer_reviews.text: The weights are good but the stand is super unstable. The pegs do not stay in and just fall out. It is thin, cheap plastic. I would suggest getting a replacement stand or using super glue to secure the pegs.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Dumbells are good quality
customer_reviews.text: The stand leaves something to be desired, it's not exactly the best quality, but it's inexpensive and the quality is where it counts: the dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: The stand is cheap and broke right away
customer_reviews.text: The weights themselves are good, not the best quality but can't beat the price, as for the stand, I tried putting it together and the screws don't even fit in the holes, when I used all my strength the stand snapped in half, very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Chanty LaPorte Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good starter dumbbell set.
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are awesome to use and the colors are very fun and bright. However, when you first take everything out of the packaging, it had a very strong chemical odor. However, it was gone by the next day. The rack is made of plastic and the construction seems shaky at best. However, it is very compact and does the trick. There's no padding at the bottom of the rack and could potentially scratch up any hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are as expected,I’m satisfied with it . The rack is a different story. Poor quality. Unable to put it together after 1 hr of trying. The screw won’t get thru the designated hole. It is easily breaks. Have to order as sturdier one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you are buying just for the stand- NOT worth it. Think- dollar store plastic quality!
customer_reviews.text: The stand is made of the flimsiest plastic. It barely holds 32 lbs. You have to screw the stand and I wish I had known- The barbells are fine and that is the only reason why it gets a 2 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Weights are great. I like the bright colors. I did not set up the stand cuz I don't need it since I have a place to "hide" them in. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sashumaker14

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Durable and as described. Bought for at home workouts when I can’t get to gym. I ditched the holder though. Kinda cheap.
customer_reviews.author: georgianne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dumbbell set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dumbbell set! I bought these to help me get back into shape after having my baby. They are soft to the touch but seem to be very good quality hand weights. Some reviewers had problem with the rack but I haven't. I love that the rack keeps them off the floor and organized for quick use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weights....sad little stand.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are good. The stand is cheap and plastic. The screws have no threads so you’ll need a power tool to get these in.
customer_reviews.author: Leaha

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put the weights outside for a couple days to "air out"-no smell at all! I put the plastic stand together - tightened the screws very tight - then put a drop of super glue on the 10 screws and it is holding perfectly. Very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: drmoore

customer_reviews.title: Slip resistant and comfortable to handle. Stand assembly sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to handle during and movement. Slip resistant. My only complaint is a bug embedded in the fabric. I had to try prying it out with tweezers. I decided waiting for a replacement wasn't feasible. Also the stand was difficult to assemble. You will need a tool with some power to drive the screws in.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMama

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her new weights!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves these new weights which are helping to get her some additional upper body strength for her swim practices. Nice smooth feel on the hands and great colors. Highly recommend and great price
customer_reviews.author: Erika Franson

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended. No damage to weights or coating ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. No damage to weights or coating in shipment, No manufacturing defects, the stand feels quite flimsy but holds together without issue.
customer_reviews.author: jeff yoders

customer_reviews.title: These dumbbells are awesome and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are awesome and exactly what I was looking for. They don't slip and are easy to use. I plan to purchase another set with larger weights from this seller once I move on to the next level. You have to put the holder together, but it is very easy. The shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonL

customer_reviews.title: one shouldn't need any written directions because it's pretty basic BUT it's made cheap
customer_reviews.text: The flimsiest weight tree I've ever seen. Unless I am putting it together wrong....but how would I know since there's no directions in the box! Then again, one shouldn't need any written directions because it's pretty basic BUT it's made cheap, cheap. VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: V. A.

customer_reviews.title: The dumbbells are great, I do not have a problem with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are great, I do not have a problem with the 8 pounders having a slightly thicker grip. However, the stand provided is absolute junk. I bought it for the good price for the dumbbells and not particularly for the stand so it doesn't truly matter. If you are buying for the stand I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: SKilker005

customer_reviews.title: slightly dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: Rack was difficult to assemble, as the holes for the posts were not large enough, and not all were correctly alligned
customer_reviews.author: Millie Pimento

customer_reviews.title: They are what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The weights are exactly what I expected. I use them for light workouts and they do the trick. I haven't had them long, so I don't know how well they'll stand up to wear and tear, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Great for upper arms!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for tightening up upper arms . If you've lost weight, Or getting a little older, using these weights help tone up. Don't need to use the heaviest....the three pound ones help me until I work up to a 5 pounder.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Diane Standish

customer_reviews.title: but the weights are nice. I'm happy overall
customer_reviews.text: The stand is a little weak, it will probably break, but the weights are nice. I'm happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: MzMarie

customer_reviews.title: Stand not sturdy but weights are great.
customer_reviews.text: Great weights. Wish stand was built better. I don't think it is going to hold up very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: nice weights, very cheap rack
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great...the rack...not so much!! My husband couldn't even get the screws screwed in all the way. It is all wobbly. I just store the weights on the ground and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle T

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Rack is flimsy but the weights are nice. I left them.on my porch for two days to air them out after reading other reviews about the smell. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Weight stand is a cheap plastic but for the price the whole unit is a good deal. All looks as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, assembly is easy
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s really great. Doesn’t take up a lot of space and is a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: gshow1313

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells are excellent, holder is plastic and adequate but isn't as sturdy as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: weights are great, great price, rack is flimsy, unfitted junk but usable
customer_reviews.text: weights were perfect, great priced. the rack was missing holes for screws and you have to press weights in the flimsy cheap plastic to hold them, but I'm using it so whatever
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Except the holder is not sturdy, but I didn't need it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely would buy again. Except the holder is not sturdy, but I didn't need it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sosh

customer_reviews.title: Replace screws provided-they are useless
customer_reviews.text: Weights are very good. The screws provided for the stand are not. Do not bother to use them-they are soft metal-the head rounds over easily. Had to find other screws to use. Unfortunately, a good product that gets a lousy rating due to cheap screws.
customer_reviews.author: vze24v5s

customer_reviews.title: Smells very chemically... the plastic stand is ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells very chemically... the plastic stand is beyond flimsy. We were also missing screws and couldn't finish assembling. But as far as using them during a workout, they seem fine
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kuo

customer_reviews.title: No screws for rack, guess we were screwed...
customer_reviews.text: Received the item. The dumbbells are as expected, but the rack has no screws to hold it together, so it won't hold the dumbbells. If I had wanted some dumbbells to lay on the floor, I wouldn't have ordered this set with the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love this weight set, perfect for getting in shape
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the rack included was just plastic that you have to put together yourself. I was half tempted not to use it, but I like organization. The weights came new in package and I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. I don't use the stand that comes with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The weights are fine, pretty standard
customer_reviews.text: The weights are fine, pretty standard. The rack is plastic and pretty cheap, also not easy to screw together.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gates

customer_reviews.title: The weights are awesome and seem very durable
customer_reviews.text: The stand isn't high quality but you can't beat the price! The weights are awesome and seem very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Dumbbells are great, soft texture to neoprene
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells are great, soft texture to neoprene. The stand though is plastic and appears in pic to be metal. The plastic stand is flimsy and pinches your fingers when you are picking up and putting back the dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good weights, cheap rack
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of weights, but the rack is cheap plastic that wobbles after assembled and is not useful. I bought because it came with a rack to keep them organized, but i tossed it and just stack the weights up.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Love them.  Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Handy to have in their own holder. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of weights for someone starting out. The stand is rather flimsy though and the one I received was lavender, not gray as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: when I opened my package I didn't see the fun colors that are in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I would give this purchase 5 stars BUT... when I opened my package I didn't see the fun colors that are in the picture, instead I received all black dumbbells. They'll still do the job, was just hoping to get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: These free weights arrived on-time and as promised. They ...
customer_reviews.text: These free weights arrived on-time and as promised. They do have a bit of a smell, but it dissipates over time.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The rack was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: They do have a funky smell, but I can't complain about the quality of these dumbbells. The rack was easy to assemble, although the screws provided were a little too big for the holes and took some effort to screw in. Overall, I love the color of these dumbbells and they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I use them whenever I don't feel like going to the gym; they will come in handy during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The weights themselves are fine, but the color of the neoprene comes off ...
customer_reviews.text: The weights themselves are fine, but the color of the neoprene comes off a bit on your hands and the rack, and the rack is really flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Su Park

customer_reviews.title: such fun colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and whatever they are coated in makes them easy to hold on to. I'm curious to see how long the rack holds up, it's a bit on the flimsy side but the weights are great
customer_reviews.author: MangoFuFu2x

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like they weren't instructions to set up the stand
customer_reviews.text: They're dumbbells..not much to say about them. I didn't like they weren't instructions to set up the stand, but I'll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeCraze718

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors!
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. I like the colors. The grip is nice. I had an old set but it is no longer complete and I cannot find the stand so I bought this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Tellyjan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great but the weight rack is plastic...I thought it looked stronger than that in the pic
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbell set is excellent, however, we had to drill new holes in the rack to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I’m using the 3 pound weights
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I’m using the 3 pound weights. That was my expectation. Maybe, if I use them enough, I can move up. It was a bit of a challenge to put the stand together.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Weights are nice and covered really well. The rack needs improvement as it flimsy and awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The weight set is nice. The stand is plastic and feels super flimsy. I'm afraid to move it.
customer_reviews.author: KKandA

customer_reviews.title: Great Dumbbells!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality dumbbells which is what I wanted. However the plastic stand is low quality and personally I plan to create a separate holder for these dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Lockes

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched. The price is unbeatable. The weights are good quality, the little stand is a nice addition (albeit plastic, but no one moves that little tree so it serves its purpose just fine), and they just feel right in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke R.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and comfy grip
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the weights are pretty true to weight. Comfortable to grip, I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLoyal

customer_reviews.title: The weights are great, but the stand came with pegs that didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great, but the stand came with pegs that didn't even fit, so it was unusable. However, the plastic it was made out of was so flimsy, I doubt I would have used it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: The Ghoulish Garb

customer_reviews.title: the weights are great, but the holder they sit on is pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: the weights are great, but the holder they sit on is pretty cheap. would I still purchase them knowing that? absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: The actual weights are nice. But smelt funny at first
customer_reviews.text: The actual weights are nice. But smelt funny at first. The stand was terrible though, it fell apart easily and would cut you as you tried to take out a weight. I kept the weights and ditched the stand. Other than that I enjoy using the weights
customer_reviews.author: C.allen

customer_reviews.title: Dumbbells are good, but the stand is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells are good, but the stand is garbage. Buy this for the dumbbells and don't bank on the stand being able to be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky lady

customer_reviews.title: The weights are great and the material does not bother my hands
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great and the material does not bother my hands. The gray plastic stand was not properly pre-drilled in some places making it difficult to assemble. I had to leave two screws out because I couldn't get the threads to catch. The stand still works without them.
customer_reviews.author: squinnt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in very good condition and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V. Salamone

customer_reviews.title: Great cheapie weights make it so easy to grab and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cheapie weights make it so easy to grab and go in the mornings to get a quick sweat in before work. The lighthweight plastic stand it comes with is nice to have too.
customer_reviews.author: Vesna

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about the reviews but ordered despite them. These weights are perfect for beginning weight lifting. Yes the holder is plastic but still works great!
customer_reviews.author: MissFish

customer_reviews.title: its a great start
customer_reviews.text: compact. good for starting work out. will need a bigger rack as i can now lift heavier weights - rehab after surgery
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Bar Bells are good -Stand is waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Barbells 5 Stars Stand -2 stars, Stand is a waste of time to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: They are good.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. sticky residue on them but hey they're not slippery which is good.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I like these weights a lot. The hand grips are comfortable, and the rack keeps them neatly stored. Nice, cheery colors!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Weight are as described. The "rack" is a piece of trash

customer_reviews.title: Nice coating on the bells for protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my fitness phenom daughter. She is using these for her workout routine. They are colorful and durable. Arrived in a timely manner. Nice coating on the bells for protection.
customer_reviews.author: John W Martin III

product_meta.title: Tone Fitness Neoprene Dumbbell Set with Rack, 32 Pounds of Weights
product_meta.description: The Tone Fitness Neoprene Dumbbell Set includes a pair of 3lb, 5lb, and 8lb dumbbells with a convenient rack to store them. The dumbbells are coated in neoprene and feature bright neon colors for easy identification. These hex shaped dumbbells are the perfect addition to any strength training routine. Improve your appearance, strength, muscle to fat ratio, bone density and even your walking performance by adding strength training to your workout routine. The dumbbells are hex shaped to prevent rolling when not in use and the neoprene coating helps protect your floors and provides an easy grip when sweating. This set is compact and perfect for traveling, so don’t let your workouts stop at home!
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES – Convenient dumbbell storage rack plus 3 pairs of neon colored dumbbells – 3 pound, 5 pound, and 8 pound; 3 pound weights are magenta, 5 pound weights are lime green, and 8 pound weights are orange
VERSATILE – The durable, neoprene material is great for indoor and outdoor workouts; Use dumbbells for a full body workout or to target individual muscle groups

FEATURES – The hex shape of the dumbbells prevents them from rolling when not in use; Neoprene coating prevents dumbbells from slipping and provides a comfortable grip; Bright, neon colors help to easily identify different weight sizes
FUNCTIONAL – The set is compact and perfect for travel; Don't let your workouts stop at home; Dumbbells are an essential addition to any strength training routine
DIMENSIONS – The assembled dimensions for this dumbbell set are 9.09” Length x 8.98” Width x 9.06” Height; The total weight of this set is 32.58 pounds
